required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Diagnostic Test on DeepDoc-an AI-based Decision Support System
clinical_study.official_title: DeepDoc - Clinical Validation of an AI-based Decision Support System in the Early Diagnostic Evaluation of Neurological Diseases: a Prospective Multi-center Study

brief_summary.textblock: DeepDoc is an AI-based decision support system for the early etiology diagnosis of neurological diseases using clinical data points from patients admitted to hospital within 24 hours.This study aims to evaluate whether the diagnosis of the DeepDoc AI-based decision support system is better than the doctor's initial diagnosis by a multi-center, superiority diagnostic study.

detailed_description.textblock: The doctor completes the admission note within 24 hours after the patient is admitted to the hospital. After informed consent is given to the patient who meet the inclusion criteria, open the DeepDoc to fill in the patient identification information. Then take the picture of the initial diagnosis of the admission note page and upload it to DeepDoc, fill the doctor's initial diagnosis into the DeppDoc. And put the patient's clinical data points into the DeepDoc to get a DeepdDoc diagnosis.

primary_outcome.measure: Accuracy of diagnosis by DeepDoc AI-based Decision Support System
primary_outcome.description: Accuracy of diagnosis by DeepDoc and compare this result with doctors

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity of diagnosis by DeepDoc AI-based Decision Support System
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity of diagnosis by DeepDoc and compare this result with doctors

secondary_outcome.measure: Specificity of diagnosis by DeepDoc AI-based Decision Support System
secondary_outcome.description: Specificity of diagnosis by DeepDoc and compare this result with doctors

arm_group.description: Patients with clinical signs and symptoms suspected of meningitis/encephalitis
Patients with clinical signs and symptoms suspected of stroke
Patients with clinical signs and symptoms suspected of headache
Patients with clinical signs and symptoms suspected of vertigo

intervention.description: Patients are diagnosed by the DeepDoc within 24 hours of admission.

study_pop.textblock: 4000 consecutive patients suspected of stroke，meningitis/encephalitis, vertigo and headache（1000 cases of each disease) are admitted to the department of neurology that consented to involvement in the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients with clinical symptoms or signs suspected of stroke，meningitis/encephalitis, vertigo and headache.
2. Neurological examination results and imaging changes within 24 hours of admission.
Exclusion Criteria:
Patients discharged, transferred to the hospital, or died within 24 hours after admission.
